answers.answer: There should be a baby there. My friend just went through a blighted ovum. Just keep hope mama. Miracles happen everyday.

There's still hope . Just blv. I had my second ultrasound today. And there still haven't seen anything. My pregnancies have bin so weird . I get both negative for blood and urine test. Even with an ultrasound they see no baby and no sac .And then by 16 weeks I get a miscarriage. I really don't understand it . Am so puzzled . Sometimes I wonder if it's bcuz I have diabetes. But idk.  Has anyone else ever went though this?

question: Im only seven weeks pregnant and had my second ultrasound done yesterday they see a sack but no baby. Dr thinks it might be sign of miscarriage. Is it possible for it to be to soon to see the baby? Is there still hope?
title: Baby to small or possible miscarriage
